title: Full-Stack Marketer
job_overview:
Looking for a smart, reliable full stack marketer with experience in:

- WordPress, Shopify, or any eCommerce platform
-Website development & landing pages
-Marketing automations (Zapier, Make, etc.)
-Email marketing (Klaviyo or similar)
-Social media content + strategy

To apply, send us:
1. Your resume
2. Your portfolio
3. Brief answers to:

Why should we hire you?
What tools are you most confident using?
Share one campaign or project you're most proud of.
